verses.verse: And now<WH3478>, O Israel, hearken<WH8085> unto the statutes<WH2706> and unto the ordinances<WH4941>, which I teach<WH3925> you<WH6213>, to do them<WH2421>; that ye may live, and go in<WH935> and possess<WH3423> the land<WH776> which Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of your fathers<WH1>, giveth you<WH5414>.

Ye shall not add<WH3254> unto the word<WH1697> which I command<WH6680> you<WH1639>, neither shall ye diminish from it<WH8104>, that ye may keep the commandments<WH4687> of Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430> which I command you<WH6680>.

Your eyes<WH5869> have seen<WH7200> what Jehovah<WH3068> did<WH6213> because of Baal-peor<WH1187>; for all the men<WH376> that followed<WH310> Baal-peor<WH1187>, Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath destroyed<WH8045> them from the midst of thee<WH7130>.
But ye that did cleave<WH1695> unto Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430> are alive<WH2416> every one of you this day<WH3117>.

Behold <WH7200>, I have taught<WH3925> you statutes<WH2706> and ordinances<WH4941>, even as<WH834> Jehovah<WH3068> my God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> me<WH6213>, that ye should do so in<WH7130> the midst of the land<WH776> whither ye go<WH935> in to possess it<WH3423>.

Keep <WH8104> therefore and do<WH6213> them<WH2451>; for this is your wisdom and your understanding<WH998> in the sight<WH5869> of the peoples<WH5971>, that shall hear<WH8085> all these statutes<WH2706>, and say<WH559>, Surely this great<WH1419> nation<WH1471> is a wise<WH2450> and understanding<WH995> people<WH5971>.
For what great<WH1419> nation<WH1471> is there<WH430>, that hath a god so nigh<WH7138> unto them<WH3068>, as Jehovah our God<WH430> is whensoever we call upon him<WH7121>?

And what great<WH1419> nation<WH1471> is there<WH2706>, that hath statutes and ordinances<WH4941> so righteous<WH6662> as all this law<WH8451>, which I set<WH5414> before<WH6440> you this day<WH3117>?

Only take heed<WH8104> to thyself<WH8104>, and keep thy soul<WH5315> diligently<WH3966>, lest thou forget<WH7911> the things<WH1697> which thine eyes<WH5869> saw<WH7200>, and lest they depart<WH5493> from thy heart<WH3824> all the days<WH3117> of thy life<WH2416>; but make them known<WH3045> unto thy children<WH1121> and thy children<WH1121>'s children<WH1121>;

the day<WH3117> that thou stoodest<WH5975> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> in Horeb<WH2722>, when Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto me<WH6950>, Assemble me<WH6950> the people<WH5971>, and I will make them hear<WH8085> my words<WH1697>, that they may learn<WH3925> to fear<WH3372> me all the days<WH3117> that they live<WH2416> upon the earth<WH127>, and that they may teach<WH3925> their children<WH1121>.

And ye came near<WH7126> and stood<WH5975> under the mountain<WH2022>; and the mountain<WH2022> burned<WH1197> with fire<WH784> unto the heart<WH3820> of heaven<WH8064>, with darkness<WH6205>, cloud<WH2822>, and thick darkness.

And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto you out of the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>: ye heard<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of words<WH1697>, but ye saw<WH7200> no form<WH8544>; only<WH2108> ye heard a voice<WH6963>.

And he declared<WH5046> unto you his covenant<WH1285>, which he commanded<WH6680> you to perform<WH6213>, even the ten<WH6235> commandments<WH1697>; and he wrote<WH3789> them upon two<WH8147> tables<WH3871> of stone<WH68>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> me at that time<WH6256> to teach<WH3925> you statutes<WH2706> and ordinances<WH4941>, that ye might do<WH6213> them in the land<WH776> whither ye go over<WH5674> to possess it<WH3423>.

Take ye therefore good<WH3966> heed<WH8104> unto yourselves<WH5315>; for ye saw<WH7200> no manner of form<WH8544> on the day<WH3117> that Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto you in Horeb<WH2722> out of the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>.
Lest ye corrupt<WH7843> yourselves<WH6213>, and make you a graven image<WH6459> in the form<WH8544> of any figure<WH5566>, the likeness<WH8403> of male<WH2145> or female<WH5347>,
the likeness<WH8403> of any beast<WH929> that is on the earth<WH776>, the likeness<WH8403> of any winged<WH3671> bird<WH6833> that flieth<WH5774> in the heavens<WH8064>,
the likeness<WH8403> of anything that creepeth<WH7430> on the ground<WH127>, the likeness<WH8403> of any fish<WH1710> that is in the water<WH4325> under<WH8478> the earth<WH776>;

and lest thou lift up<WH5375> thine eyes<WH5869> unto heaven<WH8064>, and when thou seest<WH7200> the sun<WH8121> and the moon<WH3394> and the stars<WH3556>, even all the host<WH6635> of heaven<WH8064>, thou be drawn<WH5080> away and worship<WH7812> them<WH5647>, and serve them<WH3068>, which Jehovah thy God<WH430> hath allotted<WH2505> unto all the peoples<WH5971> under the whole heaven<WH8064>.

But Jehovah<WH3068> hath taken<WH3947> you<WH3318>, and brought you forth out of the iron<WH1270> furnace<WH3564>, out of Egypt<WH4714>, to be unto him a people<WH5971> of inheritance<WH5159>, as at this day<WH3117>.

Furthermore Jehovah<WH3068> was angry<WH599> with me for your sakes<WH1697>, and sware<WH7650> that I should not go over<WH5674> the Jordan<WH3383>, and that I should not go<WH935> in unto that good<WH2896> land<WH776>, which Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee for an inheritance<WH5159>:
but I must die<WH4191> in this land<WH776>, I must not go over<WH5674> the Jordan<WH3383>; but ye shall go over<WH5674>, and possess<WH3423> that good<WH2896> land<WH776>.

Take heed<WH8104> unto yourselves<WH7911>, lest ye forget the covenant<WH1285> of Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>, which he made<WH3772> with you<WH6213>, and make you a graven image<WH6459> in the form<WH8544> of anything<WH3605> which Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath forbidden thee<WH6680>.
For Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> is a devouring<WH398> fire<WH784>, a jealous<WH7067> God<WH430>.

When thou shalt beget<WH3205> children<WH1121>, and children<WH1121>'s children<WH1121>, and ye shall have been long<WH3462> in the land<WH776>, and shall corrupt<WH7843> yourselves<WH6213>, and make a graven image<WH6459> in the form<WH8544> of anything<WH6213>, and shall do that which is evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, to provoke him to anger<WH3707>;

I call<WH5749> heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776> to witness<WH5749> against you this day<WH3117>, that ye shall soon<WH4118> utterly<WH6> perish<WH6> from off the land<WH776> whereunto ye go over<WH5674> the Jordan<WH3383> to possess<WH3423> it<WH748>; ye shall not prolong your days<WH3117> upon it<WH8045>, but shall utterly be destroyed<WH8045>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> will scatter<WH6327> you among the peoples<WH5971>, and ye shall be left<WH7604> few<WH4962> in number<WH4557> among the nations<WH1471>, whither Jehovah<WH3068> shall lead you away<WH5090>.

And there ye shall serve<WH5647> gods<WH430>, the work<WH4639> of men<WH120>'s hands<WH3027>, wood<WH6086> and stone<WH68>, which neither see<WH7200>, nor hear<WH8085>, nor eat<WH398>, nor smell<WH7306>.
But from thence ye shall seek<WH1245> Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, and thou shalt find<WH4672> him<WH1875>, when thou searchest after him with all thy heart<WH3824> and with all thy soul<WH5315>.

When thou art in tribulation<WH6862>, and all these things<WH1697> are come<WH4672> upon thee<WH319>, in the latter days<WH3117> thou shalt return<WH7725> to Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, and hearken<WH8085> unto his voice<WH6963>:

for Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> is a merciful<WH7349> God<WH430>; he will not fail<WH7503> thee<WH7843>, neither destroy thee<WH7911>, nor forget the covenant<WH1285> of thy fathers<WH1> which he sware unto them<WH7650>.

For ask<WH7592> now of the days<WH3117> that are past<WH7223>, which were<WH1961> before<WH6440> thee<WH3117>, since the day that God<WH430> created<WH1254> man<WH120> upon the earth<WH776>, and from the one end<WH7097> of heaven<WH8064> unto the other<WH1419>, whether there hath been any such thing as this great thing<WH1697> is<WH8085>, or hath been heard like it?
Did ever a people<WH5971> hear<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of God<WH430> speaking out<WH1696> of the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>, as thou hast heard<WH8085>, and live<WH2421>?

Or hath God<WH430> assayed<WH5254> to go<WH935> and take<WH3947> him a nation<WH1471> from the midst<WH7130> of another nation<WH1471>, by trials<WH4531>, by signs<WH226>, and by wonders<WH4159>, and by war<WH4421>, and by a mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027>, and by an outstretched<WH5186> arm<WH2220>, and by great<WH1419> terrors<WH4172>, according to all that Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430> did<WH6213> for you in Egypt<WH4714> before your eyes<WH5869>?
Unto thee it was showed<WH7200>, that thou mightest know<WH3045> that Jehovah<WH3068> he is God<WH430>; there is none else<WH5750> besides him<WH905>.

Out of heaven<WH8064> he made thee to hear<WH8085> his voice<WH6963>, that he might instruct<WH3256> thee<WH776>: and upon earth he made thee to see<WH7200> his great<WH1419> fire<WH784>; and thou heardest<WH8085> his words<WH1697> out of the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>.

And because he loved<WH157> thy fathers<WH1>, therefore he chose<WH977> their seed<WH2233> after<WH310> them<WH3318>, and brought thee out with his presence<WH6440>, with his great<WH1419> power<WH3581>, out of Egypt<WH4714>;

to drive out<WH3423> nations<WH1471> from before<WH6440> thee greater<WH1419> and mightier<WH6099> than thou<WH935>, to bring thee in<WH5414>, to give thee their land<WH776> for an inheritance<WH5159>, as at this day<WH3117>.

Know <WH3045> therefore this day<WH3117>, and lay<WH7725> it to thy heart<WH3824>, that Jehovah<WH3068> he is God<WH430> in heaven<WH8064> above<WH4605> and upon the earth beneath<WH776>; there is none else.

And thou shalt keep<WH8104> his statutes<WH2706>, and his commandments<WH4687>, which I command<WH6680> thee this day<WH3117>, that it may go well<WH3190> with thee<WH1121>, and with thy children after<WH310> thee<WH748>, and that thou mayest prolong thy days<WH3117> in the land<WH127>, which Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth thee<WH5414>, for ever.
Then Moses<WH4872> set apart<WH914> three<WH7969> cities<WH5892> beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383> toward the sunrising<WH8121>;

that the manslayer<WH7523> might flee<WH5127> thither<WH7523>, that slayeth his neighbor<WH7453> unawares<WH1097>, and hated<WH8130> him not in time<WH8543> past<WH8032>; and that fleeing<WH5127> unto one<WH259> of these<WH411> cities<WH5892> he might live<WH2425>:

namely <WH1221>, Bezer in the wilderness<WH4057>, in the plain<WH4334> country<WH776>, for the Reubenites<WH7206>; and Ramoth<WH7216> in Gilead<WH1568>, for the Gadites<WH1425>; and Golan<WH1474> in Bashan<WH1316>, for the Manassites<WH4520>.
And this is the law<WH8451> which Moses<WH4872> set<WH7760> before<WH6440> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>:

these are the testimonies<WH5713>, and the statutes<WH2706>, and the ordinances<WH4941>, which Moses<WH4872> spake<WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, when they came forth<WH3318> out of Egypt<WH4714>,

beyond <WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383>, in the valley<WH1516> over against<WH4136> Beth-peor<WH1047>, in the land<WH776> of Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567>, who dwelt<WH3427> at Heshbon<WH2809>, whom Moses<WH4872> and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> smote<WH5221>, when they came forth<WH3318> out of Egypt<WH4714>.

And they took his land<WH776> in possession<WH3423>, and the land<WH776> of Og<WH5747> king<WH4428> of Bashan<WH1316>, the two<WH8147> kings<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567>, who were beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383> toward the sunrising<WH4217>;
from Aroer<WH6177>, which is on the edge<WH8193> of the valley<WH5158> of the Arnon<WH769>, even unto mount<WH2022> Sion<WH7865> (the same is Hermon<WH2768>),
and all the Arabah<WH6160> beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383> eastward<WH4217>, even unto the sea<WH3220> of the Arabah<WH6160>, under the slopes<WH794> of Pisgah<WH6449>.
